Class HeroSightingsDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.superheroes.dao.HeroSightingsDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeroSightings
public class HeroSightingsDAO extends Object implements HeroSightings
This class implements the interactions with the heroSightings database through jdbc template.
